data.title: Again, Dangerous Visions 2
data.meta_description: New York, New York: The New American Library, 1973. Ed Emshwiller. Softcover. Very good+ paperback copy of Again, Dangerous Visions 2 edited by Harlan Ellison. 1st Signet Books printing J5673 with a cover price of 1.95. Light edge and corner wear. Spine ends bumped. Pages slightly tanned. Tight and clean. Enjoy this collection of short fiction including Bova, Koontz, Blish, Lupoff, Terry Carr and others! Very good.
data.text:
Ellison, Harlan

New York, New York: The New American Library, 1973. Ed Emshwiller. Softcover. Very good+ paperback copy of "Again, Dangerous Visions 2" edited by Harlan Ellison. 1st Signet Books printing J5673 with a cover price of $1.95. Light edge and corner wear. Spine ends bumped. Pages slightly tanned. Tight and clean. Enjoy this collection of short fiction including Bova, Koontz, Blish, Lupoff, Terry Carr and others! Very good. Item #4897
